Scheduled - Our system is currently undergoing maintenance activity. We are performing our annual production key rotation of our Mastercard Network Tokenization service, a process that may cause the service to be temporarily unavailable for about 15 minutes while we perform the key rotation. Note that while transactions attempted with a Mastercard network token during this rotation will not be rejected, attempts to provision a network token with a Mastercard card will not succeed during the key rotation portion of this activity.
